sentence.Network_en: The handling is simple and is a far cry from pettifogging tidy structure.

list.abs: 童话里都是骗人的 that every things in fairy tales are pettifogging 我不可能是你的王子 and I coldn't be your prince 也许你不会懂 mabe you don't.
pettifogging details , objections , etc., 无关宏旨的细节 , 异议等.

entry.tran: 吹毛求疵的；过分关注琐事的
entry.def: You can describe an action or situation as pettifogging when you think that unnecessary attention is being paid to unimportant, boring details.
